Title: Ewoks: The Battle for Endor
Writer: Ken Wheat (screenplay), Jim Wheat (screenplay), George Lucas (story)
Actors: Wilford Brimley, Warwick Davis, Aubree Miller, Siân Phillips
Plot: Marauders raid the Ewok village and steal a power supply they believe to be magical. Wicket helps Cindel escape the evil witch Charal, and they befriend a hermit who may help them save the village.
